Bash(can you automatically copy the toolkit to active projects?"

Solution Implemented:
- Auto-sync system for cross-project learning
- Smart domain filtering \(HIPAA stays in healthcare, payments go everywhere\)
- Bi-directional learning \(projects teach each other\)
- Conflict resolution \(create domain-specific variants\)
- Zero manual sync required

How It Works:
1. Toolkit learns something in ANY project \(e.g., payment patterns in govertical\)
2. Auto-sync triggers \(immediate, scheduled, or on project open\)
3. Smart filtering \(sync only to compatible domains\)
4. Copy improvements to other projects
5. Git commit with sync metadata
6. Notify user on next project open

Files Added:
- .claude/v3/self-learning/AUTO-SYNC-DESIGN.md \(full architecture\)
- .claude/v3/self-learning/active-projects.json \(project registry\)
- .claude/v3/self-learning/sync-config.json \(sync configuration\)

Active Projects:
- gpnet3 \(healthcare domain\)
- govertical \(revenue domain\)
- goassist3 \(general domain\)

Sync Rules:
- Universal improvements â†’ All projects
- Domain-specific â†’ Compatible projects only
- User preferences â†’ All projects
- Compliance patterns â†’ Compatible domains only

Example Flows:
1. Learn payment patterns in govertical
   â†’ Sync to goassist3 \(compatible\)
   â†’ Skip gpnet3 \(healthcare, not payment-focused\)

2. Learn HIPAA patterns in gpnet3
   â†’ Keep in gpnet3 only \(healthcare-specific\)
   â†’ Don''t sync to revenue/general projects

3. Learn TDD workflow preference
   â†’ Sync to ALL projects \(user behavior, not domain-specific\)

Benefits:
- Learn once, benefit everywhere
- 3x pattern multiplier \(all projects get all learnings\)
- Zero manual copying
- Consistent quality across projects
- Projects teach each other

Configuration:
- Default: Automatic mode \(zero user action required\)
- Optional: Semi-automatic \(ask before sync\)
- Optional: Manual mode \(/toolkit:sync-all\)

Privacy:
- All syncs local only \(no external servers\)
- Git commits show all changes
- Full rollback capability
- Transparent sync history

Installed In:
- âœ“ claude-code-toolkit \(source\)
- âœ“ gpnet3
- âœ“ govertical
- âœ“ goassist3
